item.title: Moving beyond git template repositories with CodeMeta
item.description: An exploration of using CodeMeta objects to generate of software artifacts as an alternative to Git template repositories.

item.title: Deno 2.1.7, Project Idioms
item.description: Notes on some of the file and code idioms I'm using with Deno+TypeScript projects.

item.title: Deno 2.1.7, points of friction
item.description: A short discussion of working with file input in TypeScript+Deno coming from the perspective of Go's idiomatic use of io buffers.

item.title: Installing Deno via Cargo and other options
item.description: Notes on setting up a Debian flavored Linux boxes, macOS and Windows to install Deno via `cargo install deno`, `curl -fsSL https://deno.land/install.sh | sh` or `iwr https://deno.land/install.ps1 -useb | iex`

item.title: When Deno+TypeScript, when Go?
item.description: Brief discussion of when I choose Deno+TypeScript versus Go for work projects.

item.title: Transpiling & Bundling with Emit
item.description: A brief discussion of using the Deno emit module to transpile and bundle TypeScript.

item.title: Raspberry Pi 4 & 400 Power Supply Issues
item.description: Quick notes on some low voltage issues I ran into with my Raspberry Pi 4 and 400 using the stock power supply with thumb drives.

item.title: Rust tools for Web Work
item.description: A quick review of a PageFind and FlatLake by Cloud Cannon. A brief description of how I use them.
